message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for sale for $110. I believe it's quite valuable and would be beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you're interested, but $95 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to go up to $100 for the product.
